newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Shipping - Grain/oilseed cargoes - May 22.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Shipping - Grain/oilseed cargoes - May 22.

text.p: The following is the berthing schedule for major dry bulk vessels unloading at Taiwan's main grain ports at Taichung and Kaohsiung, as detailed on Thursday by Taiwanese surveyors:
The discharging cargoes are given in tonnes. Berthing dates are for arrival in port/expected completion of discharge.
Corn/soy 55,275 Hanjin Casablanca Hui Shung May 13/24
Corn 54,000 Atlantic Nova Great Wall May 22/26
Incoming Taiwan grain/oilseed shipments in tonnes with scheduled dates of arrival. K is Kaohsiung; T is Taichung. Taiwan also has bulk offloading facilities at Keelung.
Commodity Tonnes Port Vessel Buyer Arrival
Corn 21,840 T Atlantic Nova Great Wall May 27
Corn 54,000 T Navois Mirerva CK Group May 27
Corn 24,230 K C Mehmet MFIG May 28
Corn 54,000 T/K Rita D'Amato MFIG May 28
Wheat 27,300 T/K Western Osprey Flour Asso May 28
Corn 54,000 K Luise Oldendorff Cargill June 2
Corn 24,230 T/K M. Nuri Cerrahoglu Mitsui June 2
Corn 54,000 K Global Ace Marubeni June 5
Estimated total corn/soybean tonnages projected to have arrived or to arrive in Taiwan in 1997:
